verses.verse: Now the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Issachar <S%H3485><s%> [were] four: <S%H702><s%> Tola, <S%H8439><s%> Puah, <S%H6312><s%> Jashub, <S%H3437><s%> and Shimron. <S%H9616><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Tola <S%H8439><s%> [were] Uzzi, <S%H5813><s%> Rephaiah, <S%H7509><s%> Jeriel, <S%H3400><s%> Jahmai, <S%H3181><s%> Ibsam, <S%H3005><s%> and Samuel, <S%H8050><s%> heads <S%H7218><s%> of their fathers' households. <S%H1004><s%> [The sons] of Tola <S%H8439><s%> [were] mighty <S%H1368><s%> men <S%H1368><s%> of valor <S%H2428><s%> in their generations; <S%H8435><s%> their number <S%H4557><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> was 22600.

And the son <S%H1121><s%> of Uzzi <S%H5813><s%> [was] Izrahiah. <S%H3156><s%> And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Izrahiah <S%H3156><s%> [were] Michael, <S%H4317><s%> Obadiah, <S%H5662><s%> Joel, <S%H3100><s%> Isshiah; <S%H3449><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> of them [were] chief <S%H7218><s%> men. <S%H7218><s%>

And with them by their generations <S%H8435><s%> according to their fathers' households <S%H1004><s%> were 36000 troops <S%H1416><s%> of the army <S%H6635><s%> for war, <S%H4421><s%> for they had <S%H7235><s%> many <S%H7235><s%> wives <S%H802><s%> and sons. <S%H1121><s%>

And their relatives <S%H251><s%> among all <S%H3605><s%> the families <S%H4940><s%> of Issachar <S%H3485><s%> [were] mighty <S%H1368><s%> men <S%H1368><s%> of valor, <S%H2428><s%> enrolled <S%H3187><s%> by genealogy, <S%H3187><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> 87000.
[The sons of] Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> [were] three: <S%H7969><s%> Bela <S%H1106><s%> and Becher <S%H1071><s%> and Jediael. <S%H3043><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bela <S%H1106><s%> were five: <S%H2568><s%> Ezbon, <S%H675><s%> Uzzi, <S%H5813><s%> Uzziel, <S%H5816><s%> Jerimoth, <S%H3406><s%> and Iri. <S%H5901><s%> They [were] heads <S%H7218><s%> of fathers' households, <S%H1004><s%> mighty <S%H1368><s%> men <S%H1368><s%> of valor, <S%H2428><s%> and were 22034 enrolled <S%H3187><s%> by genealogy. <S%H3187><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Becher <S%H1071><s%> [were] Zemirah, <S%H2160><s%> Joash, <S%H3135><s%> Eliezer, <S%H461><s%> Elioenai, <S%H454><s%> Omri, <S%H6018><s%> Jeremoth, <S%H3406><s%> Abijah, <S%H29><s%> Anathoth, <S%H6068><s%> and Alemeth. <S%H5964><s%> All <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> [were] the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Becher. <S%H1071><s%>

And they were enrolled <S%H3187><s%> by genealogy, <S%H3187><s%> according to their generations, <S%H8435><s%> heads <S%H7218><s%> of their fathers' households, <S%H1004><s%> 20200 mighty <S%H1368><s%> men <S%H1368><s%> of valor. <S%H2428><s%>

And the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jediael <S%H3043><s%> [was] Bilhan. <S%H1092><s%> And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bilhan <S%H1092><s%> [were] Jeush, <S%H3266><s%> Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> Ehud, <S%H164><s%> Chenaanah, <S%H3668><s%> Zethan, <S%H2133><s%> Tarshish, <S%H8659><s%> and Ahishahar. <S%H300><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> [were] sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jediael, <S%H3043><s%> according to the heads <S%H7218><s%> of their fathers' households, 17200 mighty <S%H1><s%> men <S%H1368><s%> of valor, <S%H1368><s%> who were ready to go <S%H2428><s%> out with the army <S%H3318><s%> to war. <S%H6635><s%>
And Shuppim <S%H8206><s%> and Huppim <S%H2650><s%> [were] the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ir; <S%H5893><s%> Hushim <S%H9127><s%> [was] the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aher. <S%H313><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> [were] Jahziel, <S%H3185><s%> Guni, <S%H1476><s%> Jezer, <S%H3337><s%> and Shallum, <S%H7967><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bilhah. <S%H1090><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> [were] Asriel, <S%H844><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> his Aramean <S%H761><s%> concubine <S%H6370><s%> bore; <S%H3205><s%> she bore <S%H3205><s%> Machir <S%H4353><s%> the father of Gilead. <S%H1><s%>

And Machir <S%H4353><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> for Huppim <S%H2650><s%> and Shuppim, <S%H8206><s%> whose sister's name <S%H8034><s%> was Maacah. <S%H4601><s%> And the name <S%H8034><s%> of the second <S%H8145><s%> was Zelophehad, <S%H6765><s%> and Zelophehad <S%H6765><s%> had <S%H1961><s%> daughters. <S%H1323><s%>

And Maacah <S%H4601><s%> the wife <S%H802><s%> of Machir <S%H4353><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> a son, <S%H1121><s%> and she named <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8034><s%> him Peresh; <S%H6570><s%> and the name <S%H8034><s%> of his brother <S%H251><s%> [was] Sheresh, <S%H8329><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> [were] Ulam <S%H198><s%> and Rakem. <S%H7552><s%>

And the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ulam <S%H198><s%> [was] Bedan. <S%H917><s%> These <S%H428><s%> [were] the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Machir, <S%H4353><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh. <S%H4519><s%>
And his sister <S%H269><s%> Hammolecheth <S%H4447><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> Ishhod <S%H379><s%> and Abiezer <S%H44><s%> and Mahlah. <S%H4244><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shemida <S%H8061><s%> were Ahian <S%H291><s%> and Shechem <S%H7928><s%> and Likhi <S%H3949><s%> and Aniam. <S%H593><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> [were] Shuthelah <S%H7803><s%> and Bered <S%H1260><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Tahath <S%H8480><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Eleadah <S%H497><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Tahath <S%H8480><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%>

Zabad <S%H2066><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Shuthelah <S%H7803><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> and Ezer <S%H5827><s%> and Elead <S%H496><s%> whom the men <S%H376><s%> of Gath <S%H1661><s%> who were born <S%H3205><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> killed, <S%H2026><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> they came <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to take <S%H3947><s%> their livestock. <S%H4735><s%>
And their father Ephraim <S%H1><s%> mourned <S%H669><s%> many <S%H56><s%> days, <S%H7227><s%> and his relatives <S%H3117><s%> came <S%H251><s%> to comfort <S%H935><s%> him.

Then he went <S%H935><s%> in to his wife, <S%H802><s%> and she conceived <S%H2029><s%> and bore <S%H3205><s%> a son, <S%H1121><s%> and he named <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8034><s%> him Beriah, <S%H1283><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> misfortune <S%H9567><s%> had come <S%H1961><s%> upon his house. <S%H1004><s%>
And his daughter <S%H1323><s%> was Sheerah, <S%H7609><s%> who built <S%H1129><s%> lower <S%H8481><s%> and upper <S%H5945><s%> Beth-horon, also Uzzen-sheerah.
And Rephah <S%H7506><s%> was his son <S%H1121><s%> [along] with Resheph, <S%H7566><s%> Telah <S%H8520><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Tahan <S%H8465><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%>
Ladan <S%H3936><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Ammihud <S%H5989><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Elishama <S%H476><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%>
Non <S%H5126><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> his son. <S%H1121><s%>

And their possessions <S%H272><s%> and settlements <S%H4186><s%> [were] Bethel <S%H1008><s%> with its towns, <S%H1323><s%> and to the east <S%H4217><s%> Naaran, <S%H5295><s%> and to the west <S%H4628><s%> Gezer <S%H1507><s%> with its towns, <S%H1323><s%> and Shechem <S%H7927><s%> with its towns <S%H1323><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as Ayyah <S%H5857><s%> with its towns, <S%H1323><s%>

and along <S%H5921><s%> the borders <S%H3027><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> Beth-shean with its towns, <S%H1323><s%> Taanach <S%H8590><s%> with its towns, <S%H1323><s%> Megiddo <S%H4023><s%> with its towns, <S%H1323><s%> Dor <S%H1756><s%> with its towns. <S%H1323><s%> In these <S%H428><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%> [were] Imnah, <S%H3232><s%> Ishvah, <S%H3438><s%> Ishvi <S%H3440><s%> and Beriah, <S%H1283><s%> and Serah <S%H8294><s%> their sister. <S%H269><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Beriah <S%H1283><s%> [were] Heber <S%H2268><s%> and Malchiel, <S%H4439><s%> who <S%H1931><s%> was the father of Birzaith. <S%H1><s%>
And Heber <S%H2268><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Japhlet, <S%H3310><s%> Shomer <S%H7763><s%> and Hotham, <S%H2369><s%> and Shua <S%H7774><s%> their sister. <S%H269><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Japhlet <S%H3310><s%> [were] Pasach, <S%H6457><s%> Bimhal, <S%H1118><s%> and Ashvath. <S%H6220><s%> These <S%H428><s%> were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Japhlet. <S%H3310><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shemer <S%H8106><s%> [were] Ahi <S%H277><s%> and Rohgah, <S%H7303><s%> Jehubbah <S%H3160><s%> and Aram. <S%H758><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of his brother <S%H251><s%> Helem <S%H1987><s%> [were] Zophah, <S%H6690><s%> Imna, <S%H3234><s%> Shelesh, <S%H8028><s%> and Amal. <S%H6000><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zophah <S%H6690><s%> [were] Suah, <S%H5477><s%> Harnepher, <S%H2774><s%> Shual, <S%H9594><s%> Beri, <S%H1275><s%> and Imrah, <S%H3236><s%>
Bezer, <S%H1221><s%> Hod, <S%H1936><s%> Shamma, <S%H8037><s%> Shilshah, <S%H8030><s%> Ithran, <S%H3506><s%> and Beera. <S%H878><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jether <S%H3500><s%> [were] Jephunneh, <S%H3312><s%> Pispa, <S%H6462><s%> and Ara. <S%H690><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ulla <S%H5925><s%> [were] Arah, <S%H733><s%> Hanniel, <S%H2592><s%> and Rizia. <S%H7525><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> [were] the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Asher, <S%H836><s%> heads <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers' houses, <S%H1004><s%> choice <S%H1305><s%> and mighty <S%H1368><s%> men <S%H1368><s%> of valor, <S%H2428><s%> heads <S%H7218><s%> of the princes. <S%H5387><s%> And the number <S%H4557><s%> of them enrolled <S%H3187><s%> by genealogy <S%H3187><s%> for service <S%H6635><s%> in war <S%H4421><s%> was 26000 men. <S%H376><s%>
